Rajesh R wrote:

> Hi all,
> 
> I am in search of materials to use JUnit Effectively.
> 
> People do use Junit but often misses the real use of JUnit.
> 
> Can anybody provide me some links on Effective use or Best practices or 
> JUnit patterns.

I'm glad you're interested in JUnit. What links did you find with 
Google? You'll probably find the most important ones with Google. After 
you've read those sites, if you need more references, let us know more 
specifically what you're missing and we'll be glad to help you out.

Also, there are several good books about JUnit, so don't forget to 
search libraries or bookstores (like amazon) for more information.

Take care.
--
